prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano are the instruments featured in this song, but Organ is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, but Organ is not included.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, with no Organ.
